SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.shared.model

Class PlayerGoal

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.shared.model.PlayerGoal
public class PlayerGoal extends Object
This class loads a player's goal from a json file and implements the method to calculate the amount of points achieved by the player.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    PlayerGoal(String jsonPath)
    This constructor is used when the goalId needs to be chosen randomly

    This constructor is used when the goalId is known

    This constructor is used when the goalId needs to be chosen randomly

      This constructor is used when the goalId needs to be chosen randomly
      Parameters:
      jsonObject - object from which to extract the info, this object must have a goals field and a points field.
      Throws:
      JsonBadParsingException - when a parsing error happens

  • Method Details

    • playerGoalsAmount

      public static int playerGoalsAmount(String jsonPath) throws JsonBadParsingException
      This method is used to get the amount of players goals available in the provided json file.
      Parameters:
      jsonPath - Path to the json file containing the goals
      Returns:
      integer with the amount
      Throws:
      JsonBadParsingException - when a parsing error happens

    • check

      public int check(Shelf shelf) throws JsonBadParsingException
      This function uses the player's shelf and the properties of the goal to calculate the amount of points achieved.
      Parameters:
      shelf - player's shelf
      Returns:
      points achieved
      Throws:
      JsonBadParsingException - when a parsing error happens
